attributes.action: Please refuse the Rookery South Pit planning permission.
attributes.additional_details: Following the IPC's decision to grant permission for Covanta to build their giant incinerator at Green Lane, Stewartby, Bedfordshire which no one within the local and surrounding communities want. We all would like the government to refuse planning permission for the Rookery South site in Stewartby and not allow Covanta to build on the land. Ideally we would like the government to declare the land as a nature reserve so that no such developments can ever be built on the site.
